title: The Best of Patreon: June 2021
description:
Hey, y'all! If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite moments in recent weeks.
You'll hear clips from our minisode on the unbelievable McDonald's Strip Search Scam, our advice to a listener whose boyfriend led a double life in our "Dear Sinister" segment, the chilling details of a cluster of suicides at a college in Missouri in our "True Crime Headlines" episode, and finally - as requested - an update on the Love Has Won cult and the death of Mother God.
If you like what you hear and want full episodes of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits of subscribing today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Hey, y'all! If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite moments in recent weeks.

You'll hear clips from our minisode on the unbelievable McDonald's Strip Search Scam, our advice to a listener whose boyfriend led a double life in our "Dear Sinister" segment, the chilling details of a cluster of suicides at a college in Missouri in our "True Crime Headlines" episode, and finally - as requested - an update on the Love Has Won cult and the death of Mother God.

If you like what you hear and want full episodes of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits of subscribing today! 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
